class.name: Cluster

javadoc.text: Cluster holding a set of {@link Clusterable} points.
javadoc.param: <T> * the type of points that can be clustered
javadoc.deprecated: As of 3.2 (to be removed in 4.0), * use {@link org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.Cluster} instead

javadoc.text: The points contained in this cluster.
Build a cluster centered at a specified point.
javadoc.param: center the point which is to be the center of this cluster

javadoc.text: Add a point to this cluster.
Get the points contained in the cluster.
Get the point chosen to be the center of this cluster.
